description:
We’re Hitachi Vantara, a global infrastructure business. Our people are the force of meaningful progress. We enable the incredible with data – from taking theme park fans on magical rides, conserving natural resources, protecting rainforests to saving lives. We empower businesses to automate, optimize and advance innovation. Together, we create a sustainable future for all. 

Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to inspire he future. We don’t expect you to ‘fit’ every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally important to us.

The Team

We represent Hitachi Vantara to enterprise clients across industries, establishing business relationships to understand customer challenges so that we can deliver profitable business for Hitachi products, services and solutions. We collaborate as a team and cross-functionally to ensure the success of our customers; success that is celebrated and shared. Our solutions bring value to every line of business and we need people like you to build those deep relationships and to passionately articulate our value proposition.

We are seeking an experienced, high-energy technology sales leader with a proven track record motivating and inspiring other sales leaders to deliver results while transforming to meet market demands.

What you’ll be doing
• Seeking to build strong relationships and trust with new and existing customers across industry sectors. Articulating our industry-leading solutions, which include Data Centre/Storage, Cloud, Big Data, Advanced Analytics, and IoT, to enable your customers to realize the highest levels of success.
• Support, mentor, and motivate a team of experienced sales leaders in the region.
• Responsible for the region achieving quotas on a quarter-over-quarter basis, overseeing the performance of individual sales leaders within the team.
• Motivate matrixed resources to engage with the sales team and drive accountability, ensuring collaboration and cohesion among sales leaders and the sales ecosystem within the region.
• Set team expectations in alignment with the company strategy and manage the team through the transformation process, ensuring alignment with other sales leaders and teams.
• Lead and coach the performance of your team, fostering a collaborative and high-performing sales culture with a focus on winning, showing up and delivering consistent outcomes quarter over quarter.
• Forecast the business accurately and timely, consolidating inputs from various sales leaders and ensuring a unified forecast.

What you bring to the team
• An ability to think creatively and work consistently to identify, develop, and close opportunities within new or prospective customers. You'll be able to share specific examples to illustrate where and how you have done this, both individually and by leading a team of sales professionals.
• Guiding your team to make sure they have the aptitude to identify key decision-makers and build relationships that enable you to increase your level of influence within accounts.
• A track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets throughout your sales career, illustrating your persistent focus on supporting customers to realize required business outcomes, and replicating this success with the sales leaders under your lead.
• An ability to build virtual teams around you to create and deliver innovative solutions that will empower your leaders to manage their teams and deliver results.
• You follow and are passionate about industry trends and can share advice and expertise with customers, that will benefit their needs, and solve for the customer problem
• Ensure that your sales leaders stay informed and aligned with the latest industry trends and cascade their knowledge throughout their teams.
• Customer Centric mindset with a passion for solving customer problems with Hitachi’s solutions.

Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion

Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.

How we look after you

We want to help you take care of your today and tomorrow – at home and at work. Which is why we offer industry-leading benefits that go far beyond compensation. That means support, services, and resources that also take care of your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. Here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent).

About us

We’re a global team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion for insight to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can a make positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can inspire the future, this is the place to fulfil your purpose and achieve your potential.

We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.
